sentences.sContent: She alleged that there was rampant drug use among the male members of the group.

words.tran: 所谓的；声称的；被断言的
宣称（allege的过去式和过去分词）；断言

trans.tranOther: to say that something is true or that someone has done something wrong, although it has not been proved
